notesStmt.note: Phrase at head of title transliterated from Greek.
With an additional title page, engraved: A prophecy of perillous times.
The first leaf bears verses on the engraved title.
The last ten leaves contain "The authour's advertisement", errata, and "A synopsis of the foregoing treatise in six tables".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
